title: (x) Smythson's "George Street" typeface - Classic Roman {Patricia}
content:
I'm looking for something similar to what Smythson (the British stationer) calls their "George Street lettering." Identifont comes up with Weiss, but that doesn't have the curly tail on the R or the angled serifs on the M. One image below, more at [their web site.](http://web.archive.org/web/20150330001816/http:/www.smythson.com/SmythsonSite/category/Stationery%5FPersonalised+Stationery%5FView+All/)

Thanks in advance!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150330001816im_/http:/typophile.com/files/name-address-cards-detail.jpg)
author: pat
